issue.title: [C++] Add CMake option to build libraries targeting a C++14 or C++17 toolchain environment
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6800](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6800). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Such option would cause public APIs involving e.g. `string_view` to use the STL versions rather than our vendored backports
